title: minecraftforge版打不开
author: slaid
txt_content:
今天千辛万苦安装了forge，没想到安装完后打不开
刚刚安装完时显示安装成功，但是forge版1.8就是打不开，原版的1.8倒是能打开

log文件夹里的latest记事本内容如下。




[13:48:01] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: jjjjj
[13:48:01] [Client thread/INFO]: (Session ID is token:${auth_access_token}:${auth_uuid})

replies.author: efsg
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: microsoft6477
replies.txt_content:
Failed to load shader: minecraft:shaders/post/entity_outline.json
ow: Invalid shaders/program/sobel.vsh: Couldn't compile vertex program: ERROR: 0:1: '' :  Version number not supported by OGL driver

和 Invalid framebuffer operation

说sobel.vsh（vsh我只在光影配置文件里找到过= =），然后还有帧缓冲无效= =估计是你的显卡可能不支持

replies.author: slaid
replies.txt_content: 好吧，我那叫炸鸡，换电脑。。。。
